body: @lalala5 Yea, that's should be a genre if any h-artist interested to draw something like that (I'd like to call that kind of genre "ntr justice", and I think it'll take quite some time before any of those artist realize that ntr justice will attract a lot of readers.

Even if this doujinshi is just fiction, it means something that thecharacter have some belieable reactions otherwise it is a joke not a sad story. The problem with this netorare (and many of them) is not that your main character are betrayed by his most important people (girlfriend, mother, dauther or wife), the problem is his lack of reaction. I know tha what i called problem it is something that represent netorare but i think it would be more enjoyable and with better stories if the main character react as someone normally do (with anger in most cases, violence or in some greater situation with a master plan for revenge, and i dont say that it has to be a hapy end or that he win in the end but at least that he tried).
